description: Dynamic narrative template for generating personalized Myrtle Wealth Blueprints from CRM variables.

sections.title: Your Financial Identity — Who You Are Today

EVERYDAY_BUILDER.simple_meaning: You are establishing your financial foundation — building stability, developing strong money habits, and creating the structures that support long-term confidence.

STRATEGIC_ACHIEVER.simple_meaning: You are actively expanding your wealth through diversified investments, income growth strategies, and forward-looking financial planning.

PRIVATE_WEALTH_NICHE.simple_meaning: You oversee significant assets and decisions. Your priority is wealth preservation, strategic growth, governance, and multi-generational continuity.

sections.purpose_text: This section helps us understand where you are on your financial journey so we can recommend solutions that match your lifestyle, goals, capacity, and long-term aspirations.

sections.title: Your Net Worth Position — A Clear Picture

NW1.label: Emerging
NW1.simple_meaning: You are in the early wealth-building phase. Your current structure focuses on stability and growth foundations.

NW2.label: Mass Affluent
NW2.simple_meaning: You have a growing financial base and expanding opportunities. With structure, your net worth can scale rapidly.

NW3.label: Affluent
NW3.simple_meaning: You have established assets and are now in a stage that requires thoughtful diversification, risk-managed growth, and early legacy planning.

NW4.label: Private Wealth
NW4.simple_meaning: You are operating at a governance and preservation level. Your plan prioritizes multi-asset strategy, global diversification, security, and intergenerational wealth.

sections.purpose_text: Net worth assessment helps us understand your financial capacity, your liquidity needs, and the type of structures best suited for your long-term prosperity.

sections.title: Your Investment Personality — Your Comfort With Risk

CONSERVATIVE.simple_meaning: You prefer stability and protection above aggressive growth. Your strategy prioritizes security and predictable returns.

MODERATE.simple_meaning: You value balance — steady returns with measured exposure to growth opportunities.

GROWTH.simple_meaning: You are comfortable with calculated swings because you have a long-term mindset and seek meaningful expansion.

AGGRESSIVE.simple_meaning: You think in decades, not days. You embrace volatility in pursuit of strong long-term returns.

sections.purpose_text: This tells us how you naturally make financial decisions and ensures your portfolio aligns with your temperament, not pressure or uncertainty.

sections.title: Your Goals & Financial Behaviour — What You’re Building Toward

reaction_dips.BUY_MORE: You see dips as opportunity — a strategic long-term thinker.
reaction_dips.STAY_INVESTED: You remain calm during fluctuations — a disciplined investor.
reaction_dips.REDUCE_EXPOSURE: You prefer to manage downside carefully.
reaction_dips.EXIT: You value capital safety and want minimum turbulence.

volatility_comfort.VERY_COMFORTABLE: You’re unfazed by swings; you trust long-term outcomes.
volatility_comfort.MODERATE: You accept volatility as part of growth.
volatility_comfort.SLIGHTLY_UNCOMFORTABLE: You prefer managed volatility and stable progression.
volatility_comfort.NOT_COMFORTABLE: You want minimal fluctuation and steady results.

liquidity_need.VERY_HIGH: We prioritise flexible, low-lock instruments for you.
liquidity_need.MODERATE: Your plan can tolerate structured liquidity intervals.
liquidity_need.LOW: Your funds can work for you over longer cycles.
liquidity_need.NONE: Your horizon allows for maximum long-term strategy.

sections.purpose_text: These behavioural insights help us design a portfolio you can stay consistent with — not just one that looks good on paper.

persona_risk_path_narratives.STRATEGIC_ACHIEVER_GROWTH: Your pathway supports expansion, intentional risk-taking, and global diversification.
persona_risk_path_narratives.PRIVATE_WEALTH_NICHE_AGGRESSIVE: Your pathway blends sophisticated multi-asset strategies with preservation and legacy transition planning.

sections.purpose_text: These recommendations align your goals, capacity, temperament, and long-term vision into a focused investment pathway.
